name: responsive-typography
description: An easy, responsive, universal typographic scale for the web powered by CSS variables.
author: Drew Powers

scripts.build:cjs: npx typescript --project tsconfig-cjs.json && mv index.js index.cjs
scripts.build:mjs: npx typescript --project tsconfig-mjs.json && mv index.js index.mjs
scripts.build: npm run build:mjs && npm run build:cjs
